Pacifix contemplated the information Artemis just gave him. Thinking it
through very thuroughly, processing every angle to the equation. "It
would be nice to know right away what kind of fight, but I don't want to
send any of you into hostile territory, that would be unfair. I'll go
alone." He turned around and transformed, connecting to his rear
section. "I'm sorry our discussion will have to wait Gesper. Artemis and
Hoist should be happy to give you a tour of the ship, and show you it's
technology." He then started to rev his engine.
